website_summaries.verdict: Snug fit and plenty of padding make this headgear great for any strike-heavy martial sport.
pros: Excellent cushioning for full contact sports
Snug-fitting headgear with durable, comfortable leather inside and out
Available in a variety of patterns
cons: Chin strap gets in the way of proper head positioning and is too short for some to fasten securely
Some users may need to order a size up as the headgear is too snug

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Good Protection.
customer_reviews.text: Do enjoy getting punched or kicked in the head? Sure. We all do. But get hit enough times and you might find that having a little extra protection does some good. Put this headgear on and you'll have that protection. Will it stop a bullet or a knife? No. Will it make you look like Shatterstar? Debatable. Will it protect against punches/kicks? Yes.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Moon

customer_reviews.title: Get the next size up
customer_reviews.text: Ok, good headgear, but the sizing is too small. I followed their sizing instructions and bought the one that was suppose to be good for me, but was too tight. I can and do use it, but the next size up would have been perfect. Hasn't stretch out at all. Good product, but get the next size up if you are unsure.
customer_reviews.author: Dontread13

customer_reviews.title: Item doesnt match the description
customer_reviews.text: Wasted more time today returning this. Specifically says cheek protection and is pictured as well. Guess what......no cheek protection
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done... not the best option
customer_reviews.text: Used for about a year before I decided to upgrade. It does its job, but honestly the visibility is fairly poor and if you sweat enough the buckle rusts, like mine eventually did. There's not a lot of ear protection and the cheek pads are pretty shallow so they leave my nose out there. Spend an extra $10 on something better.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C

customer_reviews.title: USA Boxing Approved Headgear
customer_reviews.text: I have had this headgear for a really long time. Roughly 4 plus years. It has seen a lot of use, and is still in perfect shape and condition. I will say that over the years I have had to tighten the head gear more and more, perhaps the leather is starting to stretch --- but over all I could not be pleased enough. This head gear is still in wonderful shape years later. During the fight that you can see on my review photos, great comparison ---- the female I am fighting --- her head gear continued to fall off and spin during the entire match. My headgear was strapped on and in place! NO moving!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Approved for competition
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets of this headgear for my boys who are fighting as amateur boxers this coming year. They look fantastic, and the quality is very good. For regular sparring they wear their Winning headgear with the nose bar protection, but they are required to fight in approved headgear, which these are. My boys are excited to be wearing the Red, white, and blue!
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian Mom

customer_reviews.title: nice fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: nice fit and comfortable, annoying thing though is the strap is too short and hard to use. It needs a longer strap and the headgear is the exact size for my head (22 inches) on the lower end. I don't get why the strap is so short. It's a good otherwise but this is a pain to secure
customer_reviews.author: Melky

customer_reviews.title: Decent headgear. Chin strap is a little short.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this in boxing sparring twice now. It does a pretty decent job. Gives good protection, takes a little off my peripheral but my field of vision is still good. Had to adjust it after a round or two to get it just right but after that it was fine. The chin strap is a bit short though. Can be an issue for some. Would definitely recommend for beginners and amateurs.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great headgear!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for sparring sessions with my cousins and we like them so far. They stay on our heads good and don’t fall off. Only thing is the chin is exposed but it helps us out by covering up more and trying to protect it. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: nick arriaga

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great head gear, competition ready, lightweight but strong. Feels great on your head, sometimes i forget its there, no chaffing, just a top quality product my coach also liked it alot, great quality you would expect from Ringside, overall very happy with it, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: HSM

customer_reviews.title: This headgear is nice! It's thinner than my old title headgear but ...
customer_reviews.text: This headgear is nice! It's thinner than my old title headgear but I feel like it offers better protection. Its soft and flexible so its very comfortable and takes punches well.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a competition in NYC , Always prefer Ringside great quality However my son was not allowed to wear and had to use his Sting open face gear
customer_reviews.author: T. Boertlein

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Sent me something else than pictured not USA boxing certified
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: Killer price and after getting hit a few times or a lot a few times, I can say it does the job and I feel adequately protected. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Cass

customer_reviews.title: good visability
customer_reviews.text: I hate wearing headgear, but this makes it much more manageable. Good visability and cushioning compared to other headgear that I've used that sacrifices both or one for the other, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great about this headgear but the buckle on chin strap ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this headgear but the buckle on chin strap is a bit difficult to deal with. Velcro tapes instead of buckle would have done better here.
customer_reviews.author: Kumar Saket

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great head gear for the price! Quick delivery and in good condition. Runs small I recommend that you buy a size bigger than what you think you need. I thought I was a large and thanks to the reviews I saw on here I bought an XL and BOOM fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.author: JOE BLACK

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great protection and still comfortable. It needs a redesign on the chinstrap though.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: This product lasted 3 years for my son, I ...
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted 3 years for my son, I think it could've lasted longer if my 11-year-old son didn't tug at the strap so hard.
customer_reviews.author: NenA

customer_reviews.title: Offers little to the chin.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it complies with the rules of amateur competition. However, it offers little around the chin. Also, most of the sizes seem too small.
customer_reviews.author: Pied Piper

customer_reviews.title: Women may have to go to a higher size than ...
customer_reviews.text: Women may have to go to a higher size than anticipated. I am 5'4", 121 pounds, with what I think is a normal sized head with hat size around 7 1/4, and I had to get a large size.
customer_reviews.author: Viola

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by the Weight. Very light. I know there are better, but this one do the job for its price. Leather is fine. Its fresh and well adapted to my head. It takes out some visibility, more with your adversary close to you.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, great quality gear
customer_reviews.text: I love this headgear! it's super light but still offers enough protection. I got mine in blue, but the color on the website was misleading. It looks more teal online, but it's actually a nice dark sea blue. I honestly I hoped the color would be more dark, so I'm completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and durability. I also like the unique color of this head gear. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: It takes a couple of steps to get the perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, it is really easy to adjust. I used it for a kickboxing tournament and it was really good. No concussions. That's always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvis Machado

customer_reviews.title: Great head gear
customer_reviews.text: Great head gear, I wear it when my wife and son want to get a work in. I let them throw hard and this head gear is more than ample protection. I don't think you can do better for the price point and quality.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Picture Lied
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't even look like how it does in the picture, the USA patch doesn't have the gold accent and looks like a cheap knock off, the leather isn't that good either.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Great headgear. Had it for about a year and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headgear. Had it for about a year and still in really good condition. No tears in seams, cleans easy.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great competition approved headgear! Bigger and better quality than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does its job and does it well
customer_reviews.text: really keeps your head feeling as though it is protected. got this while I trained college boxing and it does a good job of protecting your head from hard blows by kind of distributing them. Solid headgear.
customer_reviews.author: ben f.

customer_reviews.title: I liked the price and the quality of the construction
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son as a replacement to outgrown head gear. He likes the fit without overkill protection , I liked the price and the quality of the construction. It has held up great. No problems with the stitching or chin strap.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: these headgear will not slip off easily. They are the best
customer_reviews.text: As long as you use the size chart and Measure your head, these headgear will not slip off easily. They are the best. This is the ultimate choice for head gear.
customer_reviews.author: boxer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Headgear
customer_reviews.text: Fits Perfect Just Received Today And It feels Good Nice and Comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Tennison

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect! Just as pictured. Got a large, adult female.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: The chin strap is a little difficult to fasten at time and the interior lining gets a little hot while sparring but it has great
customer_reviews.text: For the price it certa inky meets my expectations. The chin strap is a little difficult to fasten at time and the interior lining gets a little hot while sparring but it has great padding and protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's great headgear! I use it almost everyday and I ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great headgear! I use it almost everyday and I love it. I can still see out of it without any interference and it's fits perfectly. Would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: jessi Mogensen

customer_reviews.title: It delivers great protection during sparring but also gets a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: It delivers great protection during sparring but also gets a lot of attention from my gym members. It's like a one-of-a-kind and everyone at my gym knows who it belongs to. A great product!
customer_reviews.author: Max Boedder

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING QUALITU FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: IT ADJUST PERFECTLY I am a women, got a Small. I feel a Medium would fit good too. Really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Domingo

customer_reviews.title: Misunderstanding
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have the USA approved seal so I'm unable to wear it in competition.
customer_reviews.author: Quatorian

customer_reviews.title: very nice. good fit. good protection
customer_reviews.text: fits well. good protection but someone at the gym stole it the first time i brought it in! :(
customer_reviews.author: Erica S

customer_reviews.title: Upside is thats its a great head gear
customer_reviews.text: The egal was all yellow thats the only downfall. Upside is thats its a great head gear. Barly felt the hits.
customer_reviews.author: jose juan cisneros jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product! A variety of sizes are available as well! My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Strap works horribly. Sparred one time in it and it bounces all around. I’m returning it
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: I
customer_reviews.text: Product had missing stars from the USA headgear looks very bad
customer_reviews.author: Harun

customer_reviews.title: Good looking headgear
customer_reviews.text: Great looking headgear! Wish it was a bit more padded inside. Other than that its great.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben R.

customer_reviews.title: its great for me at least
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for weeks, its great for me at least.
customer_reviews.author: Wenqiao Ma

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fit. Good padding
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fit. Good padding. Very comfortable. Super nice leather, soft and good texture. Overall I'm very happy. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ting

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 8yr old champion loves it! It's fits nice and snug and it don't move on his head. Keeps him more concentrated on his opponent. Quality is great
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Hard to see
customer_reviews.text: Its a good headgear but its hard to see well
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great headgear. stays in place. just what we needed. also came in on time. great service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Help protect your brain
customer_reviews.text: Good comfort, very good adjustability, and so far great protection while sparing
customer_reviews.author: Sean Condon

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: It’s fits comfortably and it’s good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David Parga

customer_reviews.title: ... competion yetonly once in sparring and he likes it fine.
customer_reviews.text: Actually we haven't used it in competion yetonly once in sparring and he likes it fine.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Dinkins

customer_reviews.title: good head gear
customer_reviews.text: good head gear. I would recommend. Good quality! protects head well no nose protection or jaw protection so keep ur guard up.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco fonseca

customer_reviews.title: ... have a title and everlast headgear this is way better then both fits nice
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a 5 because I have a title and everlast headgear this is way better then both fits nice, light and of good quality and material
customer_reviews.author: hector gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I like the head gear but i only wanted one of ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the head gear but i only wanted one of them.I received two of them and was charge for two.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed the adjust-ability of the product, and the leather on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Samora

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Because it is leather on the inside it slips when you get hit a little hard
customer_reviews.author: Adrian_14

customer_reviews.title: Logo was yellow
customer_reviews.text: It is a very well made product, the symbol of the eagle is not the color it shows though. Mine was solid yellow.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for practice
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Great for sparring practice. Not exactly something I would use for serious competition. I could see if someone took a leg to the head wearing this, sure it would help but there are other, more expensive and yet more padded headgear out there.
customer_reviews.author: Davia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great headgear i love it its light weight and comfortable i would recommend it %100
customer_reviews.author: alec chong

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't use it
customer_reviews.text: The chin strap is much too short for an adult. I exchanged it for a larger size and it was still too short. I ended up returning it and getting a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: ... 3 stars but our first one we bought was perfect. So later on we purchased another but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I would normally given this 3 stars but our first one we bought was perfect. So later on we purchased another but the strap was so short you could buckle it, so we exchanged it for another and it came back with bad sewing defects so we sent that one back too. So I guess it is just a luck of the draw if you get something well made because ringside might be sending amazon their not so perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: 5M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent head gear for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I continue to be impressed with Ringside gear. This head gear is real leather and very well made. It has adjustments in back, on top and the chin. The visibility is excellent. It fits a little snug but I would rather have that than loose.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Richardson

customer_reviews.title: I bought mainly as protection for my son. Being ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought mainly as protection for my son. Being the victim of a double brain aneurysm he falls frequently and unexpectedly. This head gear has saved him many times from additional head injuries.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Moser

customer_reviews.title: It's good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Its good but if your a pro. It wont last.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo Montellano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not one headache yet . I used it 3 times a week for the last month
customer_reviews.author: Kyle marrero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ringside makes some of the best boxing gear. I've never had a bad product from these guys.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Normal headgear hurt my head from being too tight. ...
customer_reviews.text: Normal headgear hurt my head from being too tight. The extra large size in this product solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Leviner7

customer_reviews.title: ... why All USA Boxing Headgear for amateur are kinda BAD..
customer_reviews.text: All I can tell you it's that Ringside Competition Headgear it's WAY BETTER than TITLE BOXING. No need to Thank me !~
customer_reviews.author: KNighTErRanTry ♞

customer_reviews.title: Not suede lined
customer_reviews.text: The headgear seems solid, but I haven't tested it yet. However, it's described as having suede lining and what I received is just regular leather interior.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Headgear not only looks good feels good. Very good protection and headgear doesn't move very sturdy and I get a lot of compliments with this headgear.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Pazz

customer_reviews.title: Great headgear for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great headgear, comfortable, light, and easy to fit. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I received a very very very old headgear, and it fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Seemed very annoying for him to have so much around his face ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm concerned my son won't use this gift. Seemed very annoying for him to have so much around his face and eyes. Think it will detract from his work out.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Opinion
customer_reviews.text: Nice standard quality boxing headgear for sparring, Does it’s job well for longterm use !
customer_reviews.author: Alan

product_meta.title: Ringside Competition-Like Boxing Headgear with Cheeks
product_meta.description: Not approved for competition by USA Boxing. The Ringside headgear is complete with a sleek contoured design and curved cheek protections to better protect the head and face. Made of durable leather construction to ensure lasting dexterity and performance with top quality laminated foam system that disperses impact so you can focus safely on sparring and fighting. Top rated head gear for boxing, MMA, Muay Thai and partner contact sport athletes alike to practice to complete your home or commercial gym.
feature_bullets: Not approved for competition by USA Boxing
The Ringside headgear is complete with a sleek contoured design and curved cheek protections to better protect the head and face
Made of durable leather construction to ensure lasting dexterity and performance with top quality laminated foam system that disperses impact so you can focus safely on sparring and fighting
Top rated head gear for boxing, MMA, Muay Thai and partner contact sport athletes alike to practice to complete your home or commercial gym
Search B07G4ZCLBL to find Ringside’s competition approved headgear
